headline: Power Grid Q4 Results: Net profit marginally down  ?4,143 crore, final dividend of  ?1.25 declared. Check details
intro: Power Grid Corporation of India witnessed a marginal slide in its Jan-Mar quarter net profits to  ?4,143 crore. The State-owned power transmission giant also declared its fourth dividend issue for the FY2024-25 on Monday, 19 May 2025.
imagecaption: Power Grid Corporation of India announced its fourth quarter results and the final dividend issue on Monday, 19 May 2025.

headline: Q4 results today: Power Grid, DLF, Pfizer, New India Assurance, NLC India, Gujarat Gas, more on May 19
intro: Power Grid Corporation of India, DLF, Pfizer, New India Assurance, NLC India, and Gujarat Gas are among 104 companies that will release their Q4 results on May 19 today.
imagecaption: Q4 results today: PGCIL, DLF, Pfizer, New India Assurance, NLC India, PI Industries, Borosil, Everest Industries and Gujarat Gas are among at least 104 companies scheduled to release their Q4FY25 earnings reports on Monday.

headline: Shares to buy: Prashanth Tapse of Mehta Equities suggests buying Apollo Hospitals, Power Grid, SBI in the short term
intro: Shares to buy: Prashanth Tapse recommends buying these three stocks in the short term - Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd, Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd, and State Bank of India (SBI).
imagecaption: Shares to buy: Prashanth Tapse recommends buying these three stocks in the short term - Apollo Hospitals Enterprise Ltd, Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd, and State Bank of India (SBI).

headline: Maharatna company Power Grid Corporation of India declares up to  ?6000 crore fundraise via bonds
intro: Power Grid Corporation of India has announced the issuance of  ?6,000 crore unsecured bonds for 2025-26, approved by its Committee of Directors. The bonds will be listed on BSE and NSE, have a tenure of ten years, and interest payments will be made annually.
imagecaption: Maharatna company Power Grid Corporation of India declares up to  ?6000 crore fundraise via bonds

headline: CBI arrests Power Grid Corporation of India GM Uday Kumar for taking  ?2.5 lakh bribe
intro: The CBI has arrested GM of Power Grid Corporation of India Uday Kumar for taking a bribe of  ?2.5 lakh
imagecaption: CBI arrested Power Grid Corp's General Manager on Thursday, March 10, over bribery allegations.

headline: Power Grid Q3 Results: Net profit drops 4% to  ?3,861.6 crore on weak demand, EBITDA down 7% YoY; dividend declared
intro: Power Grid Q3 Results: The Maharatna Central Public Sector Undertaking (CPSU)'s revenue from operations in the third quarter of the current fiscal dropped three per cent to  ?11,233 crore
imagecaption: Power Grid Q3 Results: The PSU's net profit dropped four per cent to  ?3,861.6 crore dragged by weak demand in the third quarter of FY25.

headline: F&O Strategy: Buy Can Fin Homes, Cochin Shipyard, Power Grid, suggests Rupak De in a falling stock market today
intro: F&O Strategy: Technical views on F&O market by Rupak De, Senior Technical Analyst, LKP Securities. De suggests buying Can Fin Homes Ltd, Cochin Shipyard Ltd, and Power Grid Corporation of India.
imagecaption: F&O Strategy: Technical views on F&O market by Rupak De, Senior Technical Analyst, LKP Securities. De suggests buying Can Fin Homes Ltd, Cochin Shipyard Ltd, and Power Grid Corporation of India.

headline: Top gainers of 2024 | Trent, M&M among top 10 Nifty 50 performers, deliver hefty 25-135% returns in last 12 months
intro: Top gainers of 2024: Nifty 50's top best-performing large-caps, including Trent, M&M, Bharat Electronics, and others, delivered 25-135 per cent returns to investors in 2024.
imagecaption: Top gainers of 2024: Tata Group-owned Trent has emerged as the top Nifty 50 gainer of 2024 among blue chips, delivering a hefty 133 per cent return to investors over the last 12 months.
